question: Jason receives 55 emails a day. 20% of those emails don't require any response. He responds to the rest of them. How many emails does Jason respond to in a 4 day work week?
answer:
Jason receives 55*20/100=<<55*20/100=11>>11 emails that don't require a response
So he responds to 55-11=<<55-11=44>>44 emails per day
In a 4 day work week, Jason responds to 44*4=<<44*4=176>> 176 emails
#### 176
